participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: friendly and approachable, with a passion for music and a love for driving.
participant_1.background: i drive a nissan pathfinder. i met taylor swift. i have short brown hair. i am a convenience store manager.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: adventurous and resilient, always seeking new experiences and challenges.
participant_2.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i was raised in a single parent household. i read twenty books a year. i am a stunt double as my second job.
